querySelectType.qryStatement: SELECT p.Code, p.Creation_Time, p.Modification_Time, p.Modification_User_Code, p.External_Reference, i.Code ItemCode, i.Collection_Code, i.Collection_Element_Code, i.Color_Code, i.Size_Id, i.Variant_Id, i.State_Code, ipp.* FROM Product p RIGHT JOIN Item i ON i.Product_Id = p.ID RIGHT JOIN ITEM_SELLING_PRICE_BU ipp ON ipp.Item_Id = i.Id WHERE (i.id >= 1 AND i.id <= 5)
